channel.title: OceniaX - Need Developers ASAP
channel.description:
[u][b]EDIT: CAN A MODERATOR PLEASE MOVE THIS TO DEVELOPMENT TEAMS![/b][/u]
[center][u][b]Some server content first:[/b][/u][/center]
[center][IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2dgvvox.png[/img]
*
[u][b]What is OceniaX?[/b][/u]
[I]- OceniaX is a runescape private server owned by Anthony, it is VPS hosted and domained. Anthony has to pay about 19$ a month for these 2 things, always does his best make the game best for you guys. Our team puts alot of effort into it. We are a new rsps so the average online players is 5, we need your support in order for us to reach over 20 players! we've been running for about 3 days.[/SIZE][/I]
[u][b]Features:[/b][/u]
[I]- Great Home Area (Yanille) - 100% curses with effects. - Voting system. - Great website and forums. - Active staff members. (Still hiring) - Many bosses, such as tormented demons/Jad/BarrelChest/Kbd! - Donator features, Donator area with shops and rank! - New Lottery system. - New super donator rank. - 100% ancients and lunar, all spells work and formulas. - Alot of skills work including slayer. - Perfect economy, good prices and monsters to train on.[/I]
[u][b]Credits:[/b][/u]
[B]Solitude Base: 60% Me: 40% for changing things and edits, hosting etc..[/B]
[IMG]http://oceniax.info/images/image1.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://oceniax.info/images/image2.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://oceniax.info/images/image3.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://oceniax.info/images/image4.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][u][b]Currently Hiring:[/b][/u]
[i]-Forum Developer [1 spot] -Client Coder [1 spot] -Server Coder [1 spot][/i]
[u][b]Application Format:[/b][/u]
[code]Applying For: Java Experience: What can you code: Why do you want to be the coder: What can you bring to OceniaX: Msn/Skype: [/code] [u][b]Forum Developer Application:[/b][/u]
[code]Can you code php/html/css?: Years Experience: What can you bring to us: Why do you want to be the forum developer: Msn/skype: Other info?:[/code][/center]

item.title: OceniaX - Need Developers ASAP

item.description:

mr extremez:

Look’s like a 100 % solitude leech to me just from the pictures.

item.title: OceniaX - Need Developers ASAP
item.dc:creator: @fier12 fier12
item.description:
@fier12 wrote:

Applying For: Server Coder

Java Experience: Two Years now

What can you code: It depends on what you wat me to code?

Why do you want to be the coder: I feel like i have great potential And also i would like to see your server go farther then where it’s currently at.

What can you bring to OceniaX: I can try bringing a whole new level of gaming to OceaniaX, try to almost look like Runescape. (when it was better)

Msn/Skype: Skype

Read full topic

item.title: OceniaX - Need Developers ASAP
item.dc:creator: @Anthony24 Anthony24
item.description:
@Anthony24 wrote:

EDIT: CAN A MODERATOR PLEASE MOVE THIS TO DEVELOPMENT TEAMS!

[center]Some server content first:[/center]

[center]

What is OceniaX?

- OceniaX is a runescape private server owned by Anthony, it is VPS hosted and domained. Anthony has to pay about 19$ a month for these 2 things, always does his best make the game best for you guys. Our team puts alot of effort into it. We are a new rsps so the average online players is 5, we need your support in order for us to reach over 20 players! we’ve been running for about 3 days.[/SIZE]

Features:

[I]- Great Home Area (Yanille)

  • 100% curses with effects.
  • Voting system.
  • Great website and forums.
  • Active staff members. (Still hiring)
  • Many bosses, such as tormented demons/Jad/BarrelChest/Kbd!
  • Donator features, Donator area with shops and rank!
  • New Lottery system.
  • New super donator rank.
  • 100% ancients and lunar, all spells work and formulas.
  • Alot of skills work including slayer.
  • Perfect economy, good prices and monsters to train on.[/I]

Credits:

Solitude Base: 60%
Me: 40% for changing things and edits, hosting etc…

[/center]

[center]Currently Hiring:

-Forum Developer [1 spot]
-Client Coder [1 spot]
-Server Coder [1 spot]

Application Format:

Applying For: Java Experience: What can you code: Why do you want to be the coder: What can you bring to OceniaX: Msn/Skype:
Forum Developer Application:

Can you code php/html/css?: Years Experience: What can you bring to us: Why do you want to be the forum developer: Msn/skype: Other info?:[/center]

Read full topic
